name: 陳文輝
objective: 本課程提供學生學習資料分析與處理的基本技巧，包括數據模型及視覺化處理及實例應用之探討，修習本課程之學生需具備一定之程式及英文論文閱讀能力。本課程另有指定每週英文論文閱讀與報告，主題將於上課時公佈。
schedule:
This course is designed to provide students with the basics of data analysis and visualization. 
Week 1: Introduction to Data Analysis and Processing
Week 2-3: Basics of Statistics
Week 4-6: Fundamentals of Data Analysis
Week 7-9: Principles of Data Visualization
Week 10: Midterm
Week 11-13: Paper Readings on Large Language Models (LLMs) 
Week 14-16: Paper Readings on Vision-Language Models (VLMs)
Week 17: Industrial Applications in Data Analysis
Week 18: Project Presentation and Discussion
scorePolicy:
1.	In-class Exercises & Assignments: 40%
2.	Midterm: 30%
3.	Final Project: 30%
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG3：良好健康和福祉（Good Health and Well-being）SDG4：優質教育（Quality Education）SDG8：尊嚴就業與經濟發展（Decent Work and Economic Growth）SDG10：減少不平等（Reduced Inequalities）
